description: Concatenate values from two or more columns, and/or adds a text prefix, and/or adds a text suffix into a new column.

input.name: data
input.description: The datatable containing the columns to be concatenated.

input.name: columns
input.description: A list of columns to be concatenated. The output value matches the listed order.

input.name: delimiter
input.description:
Specifies text to separate each concatenated value.
If unspecified, defaults to `""` (blank).

input.name: prefix
input.description:
Specifies text to be prefixed to each concatenated value.
If unspecified, defaults to `""` (blank).

input.name: postfix
input.description:
Specifies text to be postfixed to each concatenated value.
If unspecified, defaults to `""` (blank).

input.name: target
input.description: The new column containing concatenated values.

output.name: data
output.description: A datatable with the concatenated column added.
